帳

Значения

Тетрадь

Мнемоника

Длинный 長 кусок материи 巾. Позднее — шелковый свиток с объёмистым текстом, опись.

heisig_chinese_memo: In ancient China tents were built from towels. So tents were nothing more than long towels arranged in a clever way.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: notebook, account book, album, curtain, veil, net, tent
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: ноутбук, гроссбух, альбом, занавес, вуаль, сетка, палатка
koohiiStory1: In ancient China books were rolled-up scrolls of paper. So notebooks were nothing more than long towels.
koohiiStory2: Students, for this class, your notebook will be a towel. Make sure it´s extra long though, we´ll have a lot of writing.
jp_example_words:
几帳面(きちょうめん): methodical, punctual, steady
帳(とばり): curtain
通帳(つうちょう): passbook
手帳(てちょう): notebook
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Take your towel and make it long. It has to be longer than that! For this will be your notebook, which you will write all your notes in.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You are making the towel really long, because it's white and it might be good for writing in. It's going to become your notebook.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Inside your long towel notebook you just write the same name over and over again: "Mrs. Chou" (ちょう).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Something bad is going to happen, and you need to warn everybody. It's her, it's her, it's her. Mrs. Chou, Mrs. Chou, Mrs. Chou!
Ru_Meaning: notebook, account book, album, curtain, veil, net, tent

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you have a super super long towel and a creative mind, you can make a tent with it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " scarf " to " long " sound. The original meaning is bed nets. "Shuowen": "Account, Zhang Ye. From the towel, long voice." Duan Yucai's note: "Take the rhyme as a training." Shiming" says: "Account, Zhang Ye. Zhang Shi on the bed. Xiao The account is called a bucket account. The shape is like a double bucket." It was also borrowed from the ancient Chinese character." Such as "Huainanzi. "Tao Ying": "Stealing the General Qi's account at night and offering it." "Book of Jin. The Biographies of the Five Kings: "Sickness, give bed tents, clothes, money, silk, biliang, etc., and send the attendant to ask Yan."

The " tent " extension refers to various hanging curtains. "Jade articles. Towel Department: "Account, curtains." Such as "Historical Records. "Liu Hou Family": "Pei Gong enters the Qin Palace, and there are thousands of women who want to stay in the palace." "Selected Works. Ban Mengjian "Fu of the Two Capitals": "Er Nai is prosperous and happy, and the tent is placed in the court of Yunlong."

" Account " also specifically refers to the army camp. Such as "Historical Records. "Xiang Yu Benji": "Xiang Wang rises at night, drinking in the tent." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Dian Wei Chuan": "The strong man under the tent has Dianjun, who carries a pair of halberds and 80 catties."

" Account " later refers to the booklet for registering property, account, etc., and then referred to as " account ". Such as "Sui Shu. "Gao Zu Ji": "Anyone who is a soldier is known to belong to the state and counties, and he has a land registration account, one with the people." "Song Shu. "Shihuo Zhi": "Zhu Zhous always play the household account, and it contains his mouth. The male husband is 20 for the dice, and 60 for the old."
humanum_short_description_en: From " scarf " to " long " sound. The original meaning is bed nets.
humanum_full_description:
從「巾」，「長」聲。本義是床帳。《說文》：「帳，張也。从巾，長聲。」段玉裁注：「以疊韵為訓。《釋名》曰：『帳、張也。張施於牀上也。小帳曰斗帳。形如覆斗也。』古亦借張字為之。」如《淮南子．道應》：「偷則夜解齊將軍之幬帳而獻之。」《晉書．宣五王列傳》：「疾篤，賜牀帳、衣服、錢帛、秔粱等物，遣侍中問焉。」

　　「帳」引伸泛指各種張掛起來的帷幕。《玉篇．巾部》：「帳，帷也。」如《史記．留侯世家》：「沛公入秦宮，宮室帷帳狗馬重寶婦女以千數，意欲留居之。」《文選．班孟堅〈兩都賦〉》：「爾乃盛禮興樂，供帳置乎雲龍之庭。」

　　「帳」又特指軍隊的營帳。如《史記．項羽本紀》：「項王則夜起，飲帳中。」《三國志．魏書．典韋傳》：「帳下壯士有典君，提一雙戟八十斤。」

　　「帳」後又指登記財物、戶口等的冊子，後作「賬」。如《隋書．高祖紀》：「凡是軍人，可悉屬州縣，墾田籍帳，一與民同。」《宋書．食貨志》：「諸州歲奏戶帳，具載其丁口，男夫二十為丁，六十為老。」

從「 巾 」，「 長 」聲。本義是床帳。《說文》：「帳，張也。从巾，長聲。」段玉裁注：「以疊韵為訓。《釋名》曰：『帳、張也。張施於牀上也。小帳曰斗帳。形如覆斗也。』古亦借張字為之。」如《淮南子．道應》：「偷則夜解齊將軍之幬帳而獻之。」《晉書．宣五王列傳》：「疾篤，賜牀帳、衣服、錢帛、秔粱等物，遣侍中問焉。」 「 帳 」引伸泛指各種張掛起來的帷幕。《玉篇．巾部》：「帳，帷也。」如《史記．留侯世家》：「沛公入秦宮，宮室帷帳狗馬重寶婦女以千數，意欲留居之。」《文選．班孟堅〈兩都賦〉》：「爾乃盛禮興樂，供帳置乎雲龍之庭。」 「 帳 」又特指軍隊的營帳。如《史記．項羽本紀》：「項王則夜起，飲帳中。」《三國志．魏書．典韋傳》：「帳下壯士有典君，提一雙戟八十斤。」 「 帳 」後又指登記財物、戶口等的冊子，後作「 賬 」。如《隋書．高祖紀》：「凡是軍人，可悉屬州縣，墾田籍帳，一與民同。」《宋書．食貨志》：「諸州歲奏戶帳，具載其丁口，男夫二十為丁，六十為老。」

帳字的基本解释

帳
zhàng
见“帐”。

帳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàng］
［《廣韻》知亮切，去漾，知。］
“帐1”的繁体字。
(1)一种张挂或支架起来作为遮蔽用的器物。通常用布帛毡革制成。用途不同，质料亦异。常指帷幔。
(2)床帐。
(3)营帐，军帐。
(4)陈列帷帐等物。参见“帳具”。
(5)古代游牧民族计算户数的单位。
(6)辽代皇族机构的名称。
(7)指辽代军队的编制单位。
(8)同“賬”。帐簿；名册。
(9)同“賬”。帐目。
(10)同“賬”。引申为债务、债权。
(11)同“賬”。比喻事情。
(12)同“幛”。参见“帳子”、“帳詞”。

帳字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帳； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页332第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?知亮切，音脹。【釋名】帳，張也。張施於牀上也。【玉篇】帷也，張也，幬也。【爾雅·釋訓】幬謂之帳。【註】今江東亦謂帳爲幬。【淮南子·道應訓】齊伐楚，市偷請爲君行薄技，乃夜解齊君之幬帳而獻之。　又與張通。【史記·高帝紀】復留止張，飮三日。【註】張，幃帳也。　又計簿也。【前漢·武帝紀】明堂朝諸侯，受郡國計。【註】計，若今之諸州計帳也。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋器】幬謂之帳。〕　謹照原書釋器改釋訓。
帳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

帳字的起名意思

暂无。

account
Basic explanation of words
account
zhàng
See "account".
account
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàng］
["Guangyun" knows brightly and cuts, goes to Yang, knows. ]
Traditional characters of "帐1".
(1) A utensil that is hung or supported as a shelter. Usually made of cloth felt leather. For different purposes, the materials are also different. Often refers to the drapery.
(2) Bed netting.
(3) Camp tents, military tents.
(4) Display curtains and other objects. See "account".
(5) The unit used by ancient nomads to calculate the number of households.
(6) The name of the royal institution in the Liao Dynasty.
(7) Refers to the establishment unit of the Liao Dynasty army.
(8) Same as "account". Account book; roster.
(9) Same as "account". Accounts.
(10) Same as "account". The extension is debt, creditor's rights.
(11) Same as "account". Metaphor things.
(12) Same as "幛". See "account", "account word".
account

zhàng
вм. 帐
Radicals: 巾, 長  (towel, long)
Meaning Mnemonic
Take your towel and make it long. It has to be longer than that! For this will be your notebook, which you will write all your notes in.
You are making the towel really long, because it's white and it might be good for writing in. It's going to become your notebook.
Reading Mnemonic
Inside your long towel notebook you just write the same name over and over again: "Mrs. Chou" (ちょう).
Something bad is going to happen, and you need to warn everybody. It's her, it's her, it's her. Mrs. Chou, Mrs. Chou, Mrs. Chou!
